conbody.p: None of the clauses specified in this subpart are for use in USAID personal services contracts. For personal services contract clauses, see (48 CFR) AIDAR Appendix D - Direct USAID Contracts with U.S. Citizens or U.S. Residents for Personal Services Abroad and (48 CFR) AIDAR Appendix J - Direct USAID Contracts with Cooperating Country Nationals and with Third Country Nationals for Personal Services Abroad.
